collection.title: White Noise Machines for Adults
collection.body_html: Mask distracting noises and calm a racing mind. Our white noise machines for adults feature a range of soothing sounds, from pure white noise to gentle nature scapes.

products.title: Chronos White Noise Machine – Type-C Rechargeable Sleep Aid for Relaxation & Soothing
products.body_html:
Chronos White Noise Machine – Type-C Rechargeable Sleep Aid for Relaxation & Soothing

Enjoy deep, uninterrupted rest with the Chronos White Noise Machine, designed to create a calm, soothing atmosphere for sleep, relaxation, or focus. With a built-in 1200mAh battery and Type-C fast charging, this compact device ensures reliable use whether at home, in the office, or while travelling.

The timed shutdown function helps save energy, allowing you to set your relaxation routine without worrying about turning it off. Its portable, lightweight design makes it ideal for babies, adults, and anyone who needs a peaceful sleep environment.

Key Features:

  • Rechargeable Convenience: Powered by a 1200mAh built-in lithium battery.

  • Fast Type-C Charging: Efficient and modern USB-C input for quick recharges.

  • Auto Timer Shutdown: Supports timed power-off to save energy.

  • Compact & Portable: Lightweight design, perfect for home, office, or travel.

  • Multi-Purpose Use: Suitable for sleeping, studying, meditating, or soothing babies.

Specifications:

  • Product Type: Sleeping aid instrument

  • Color: White

  • Power Type: Rechargeable (USB-C)

  • Battery Capacity: 18650, 1200mAh

Why You’ll Love It:

✔ Promotes deep, uninterrupted sleep
✔ Portable size – perfect for bedside or travel use
✔ Type-C fast charging for convenience
✔ Energy-saving auto timer shutdown
✔ Works for babies, adults & office relaxation

Package Contents:

  • 1 × Chronos White Noise Sleep Machine

products.title: Elysiana White Noise Machine Sleep Aid Night Light for Anxiety Relief & Relaxation
products.body_html:
Elysiana White Noise Machine Sleep Aid Night Light for Anxiety Relief & Relaxation

Create a calm, soothing sleep environment with the Elysiana Intelligent White Noise Machine. Designed to promote relaxation and better sleep, this compact device combines gentle night lighting with built-in white noise sounds to help reduce anxiety, mask background noise, and ease you into peaceful rest.

Its USB rechargeable design makes it energy-efficient and portable, perfect for bedrooms, nurseries, offices, or travel. Simple mechanical controls and a timed auto-shutdown function add convenience, while the minimalist white finish blends seamlessly into any space.

Specifications:

  • Power Supply: USB rechargeable

  • Functions: White noise, music function, timing

  • Control Method: Mechanical

  • Display: None (minimalist design)

  • Color: White

  • Size: 9 × 6 cm

Why You’ll Love It:

✔ Helps eliminate anxiety & stress
✔ Promotes deep, restful sleep
✔ Compact, portable & rechargeable
✔ Calming night light function
✔ Simple & user-friendly design

Package Includes:

  • 1 × Elysiana Sleep Meter (White Noise Machine)

  • 1 × Data Cable (USB)

  • 1 × User Manual

Glowzx White Noise Sleep Sound Machine RGB Portable for Sleep & Relaxation

Combining soothing white noise, natural sounds, colorful RGB lights, and Bluetooth streaming, this multifunctional device is perfect for bedrooms, nurseries, or travel. products.title: Manovo Hypnotic Sleep Speaker White Noise Night Light Bluetooth for Meditation & Sleep
products.body_html:
Manovo Hypnotic Sleep Speaker White Noise Night Light Bluetooth for Meditation & Sleep

Enhance your sleep and relaxation experience with the Manovo Hypnotic Sleep Speaker. This multi-functional Bluetooth speaker combines white noise, night light, and audio playback features, making it perfect for bedrooms, desktops, or portable use.

Equipped with dual 5W speakers, a built-in lithium battery (2000–4000mAh), and support for TF cards up to 32GB, it delivers immersive sound for sleep, meditation, or relaxation. The MP3/WMA/WAV/FLC playback, radio, and call functionality make it a versatile audio device for home or travel.

Key Features:

  • White Noise & Night Light: Promotes relaxation and better sleep.

  • Bluetooth 5.0 Connectivity: Stream music wirelessly from your devices.

  • Portable & Versatile: Desktop, home, or outdoor use with compact design.

  • Dual 5W Speakers: Clear, immersive sound for relaxation or music playback.

  • Multi-Functional: Supports TF cards, radio, calls, and various playback formats.

Specifications:

  • Speaker Unit: 2

  • Connection Method: Bluetooth 5.0

  • Interface Type: USB

  • Frequency Response: 40Hz–20KHz

  • Output Power: 2 × 5W

  • Signal-to-Noise Ratio: ≥75dB

  • Power Supply Mode: Built-in lithium battery (2000–4000mAh)

  • Channel: 2.1

  • Playing Time: 8 hours

  • Expanded Storage: Up to 32GB (TF card)

  • Operation Mode: Button

  • Display: Yes

  • Playback Format: MP3, WMA, WAV, FLC

  • Shell Material: Plastic

  • Size: 193 × 93 × 60 mm

Why You’ll Love It:

✔ White noise and night light for deep sleep and relaxation
✔ Bluetooth & TF card support for versatile audio playback
✔ Portable design for home, desktop, or travel use
✔ Dual speakers for high-quality sound
✔ Multi-functional device with radio, call, and button control

Package Contents:

  • 1 × Manovo Hypnotic Sleep Speaker

products.title: Ossiom Bone Conduction Bluetooth Speaker Mini White Noise Sleep Aid for Sleep and Relaxation
products.body_html:
Ossiom Bone Conduction Bluetooth Speaker Mini White Noise Sleep Aid for Sleep and Relaxation

Enhance your sleep and relaxation with the Ossiom Bone Conduction Bluetooth Speaker, a compact device that delivers high-quality sound through bone conduction technology. Designed to improve sleep, this mini speaker plays seven types of soothing white noise while allowing Bluetooth connectivity for music playback from your devices.

Its lightweight and portable design makes it perfect for home, office, travel, or bedtime use. Equipped with a 500mAh polymer battery, it provides up to 15 hours of continuous playtime on a single charge, ensuring your sleep environment stays peaceful all night.

Available in white, pink, and black, this device combines modern design with functional sleep improvement, making it ideal for both adults and children.

Key Features:

  • Bone Conduction Technology: Clear, vibration-based sound without disturbing others.

  • White Noise Playback: Seven soothing sound options for sleep and relaxation.

  • Bluetooth Connection: Stream music wirelessly from your smartphone or tablet.

  • Long Battery Life: 500mAh battery offers ≥15 hours of continuous use.

  • Compact & Portable: Mini design fits easily on bedside tables or travel bags.

  • Fast Charging: Fully charged in 1 hour via Type-C 5V input.

Specifications:

  • Bluetooth Version: 5.0

  • Battery Capacity: 3.7V polymer lithium battery, 500mAh

  • Speaker: 6 Ω 1.5W dual speakers

  • Effective Distance: ≥10 meters

  • Frequency Range: 20Hz–20kHz

  • Material: ABS

  • Color Options: White, Pink, Black

  • Product Size: 80 × 80 × 13 mm

Why You’ll Love It:

✔ Bone conduction ensures undisturbed, clear sound
✔ Seven white noise options help improve sleep quality
✔ Portable design perfect for travel or bedside use
✔ Long-lasting battery with fast Type-C charging
✔ Stylish and functional for adults and children

Package Contents:

  • 1 × Ossiom Bone Conduction Bluetooth Speaker

  • 1 × Charging Cable

  • 1 × Instruction Manual

products.title: Zonai White Noise Machine USB Rechargeable Sleep Sound Machine for Sleeping & Relaxation
products.body_html:
Zonai White Noise Machine USB Rechargeable Sleep Sound Machine for Sleeping & Relaxation

Create a quiet, relaxing environment with the Zonai Noise Machine, perfect for babies, adults, offices, dorms, or travel. This compact device delivers 9 natural sounds, including white noise, sound waves, bird songs, waterfalls, crickets, quarrels, and lullabies, helping you fall asleep faster and enjoy deep, restorative rest.

Its portable design (8×8×3.3cm) makes it ideal for bedside tables or travel bags, while the USB rechargeable lithium battery provides up to 36 hours of continuous use. The automatic shutdown timer (15/30/60 minutes) and adjustable breathing light promote relaxation and energy savings.

Key Features:

  • 9 Soothing Sound Types: White noise, sound wave, bird songs, waterfall, crickets, quarrels, lullabies, and more.

  • Portable & Compact: Small size fits on bedside tables or travel bags (8×8×3.3cm).

  • Timer & Energy Saving: Automatic shutdown after 15, 30, or 60 minutes.

  • Relaxing Light Display: Adjustable breathing light for added calmness.

  • USB Rechargeable: Built-in lithium battery with up to 36 hours continuous use.

  • Versatile Use: Ideal for baby nurseries, bedrooms, offices, dorms, or travel.

Specifications:

  • Power Supply: USB rechargeable, lithium battery

  • Voltage: ≤36V

  • Material: ABS plastic

  • Switch Type: Push button

  • Dimensions: 80 × 80 × 33 mm

  • Style: American

  • Average Service Life: 200,000 hours

  • Additional Features: Music playback, timer, adjustable light

Why You’ll Love It:

✔ Nine natural sound options for deep sleep and relaxation
✔ Compact, portable design for home or travel use
✔ Timer function for energy-efficient operation
✔ Adjustable light to enhance relaxation and calm the body
✔ Long-lasting lithium battery up to 36 hours of playback

Package Contents:

  • 1 × Zonai Noise Machine Sleep Light

  • 1 × USB Charging Cable
